data.title: Top 20 Places to Take Kids in and around Orange County, CA
data.meta_description: 2023's best places to take kids in the Orange County, CA area. Each May-June, thousands of parents vote in the KidsOutAndAbout survey of the Top 20 Places to Take Kids. Who won the top spot? An indoor play center, museum, farm, nature center, sports team? Click through to find out! Of course, there is LOTS more to do in and around Orange County: Get great ideas here on
data.meta_site_name: Kids Out and About Orange County
data.text:
The Pacific Marine Mammal Center rescues, rehabilitates, releases marine mammals and inspires ocean stewardship through research, education and collaboration.

PMMC offers award-winning, year-round, experiential programs both onsite and online for kids, youth, college students, adults, and schools. Our animal care, science, and education staff are passionate about working alongside participants and sharing their knowledge. Programs include hands-on STEM activities and a wealth of knowledge about marine mammals, the conservation issues they face, and how people can help. PMMC also has a visitor yard which offers a free experience for families to come in to learn about the animals rehabilitating in their pools as docents share information about what we do and what ocean stewardship behaviors can help these animals stay safe. The yard also has activities for young children.

With two magical Theme Parks, plus one of Southern California’s most spectacular entertainment, dining, and shopping districts, this is the place to celebrate! So gather with all the people who make you the happiest and come to The Place Where Dreams Come True.

Here at Tanaka Farms, we strive to grow the best quality produce for you and your family. Not only do we want to grow great produce for you, we think it is absolutely necessary for everyone to know where their food is coming from and how it is being grown. This is why we strongly believe in educating children and adults alike with our farm tours. We want everyone who visits the farm to come away with a newfound appreciation for food. We want to encourage more families to incorporate fresh produce into their lives and we believe that by providing a quality product and educating everyone about it, we can accomplish this.

Of course, the libraries in the Orange County area are not really ONE place, but MANY places... but it's important to emphasize how valuable libraries are for family learning and fun. The libraries in our area are wonderful about posting their events to the KidsOutAndAbout calendar so you always can get ideas for free things to do with your kids that celebrate education and imagination. KidsOutAndAbout.com takes this opportunity to salute the wonderful children's librarians who serve our community with such dedication. They're proud that locals voted them #8 in best places to take kids this year!

BubblePOP is a unique indoor playground made of bubbles! Different bubble stations are set up for interactive play incorporating varying bubble sizes, scientific theories, and overall fun! Enjoy your event in our Party Space! Our store will be open to the public. Your group will get the exclusive use of the Party Section off the main floor, right in the heart of the action! We have time slots available Monday through Friday!

The Santa Ana Zoo at Prentice Park is one of the jewels of the city, nestled in the midst of an urban setting, it provides an oasis like no other in Orange County. Roam the rainforest, trek through the aviary, relax by the butterfly garden or on the deck enjoying the waterfall at Amazon's Edge, and meet new animal friends at the Crean Family Farm. Catch an animal program on the weekend, investigate the many botanicals on exhibit, or come out for one of the Zoo's signature special events or simply pack a picnic and watch your young ones enjoy the playground.

Pretend City Children's Museum, located in Irvine, CA, is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing a unique learning experience for children. This interactive museum showcases 17 interconnected learning spaces, designed to resemble a miniature city. Beyond its exhibits, the museum also serves as a valuable community resource, offering developmental screenings, Neurodivergent Family Nights, and providing tools for families, educators, and community agencies. We warmly welcome visitors from Tuesday to Sunday, with operating hours from 10 am to 12:30 pm and 1:30 pm to 4 pm.

The Conservancy operates the Bolsa Chica Wetlands Interpretive Center located on Warner Avenue at Pacific Coast Highway in Huntington Beach; it’s open seven days a week from 9am - 4pm. Free trail maps are available at the front desk and visitors are invited to refill their water bottles with refreshing chilled and filtered water. The Bolsa Chica Conservancy provides educational programs and restoration projects for all generations to promote understanding of watersheds, wetland science, coastal ecology and environmental sustainability.

At Knott’s Berry Farm, fun is always in season, with dozens of thrilling rides, shows, and attractions in four themed areas inspired by the history and culture of California.

Take on mammoth roller coasters, Old West adventures in the authentic 1800’s Ghost Town, pay tribute to California’s Hispanic roots in Fiesta Village, experience the beach lifestyle along the Boardwalk, and go on an adventure with the world’s favorite beagle – Snoopy! Located just 10 minutes from the Anaheim resort area, the once family farm has grown into today's family fun destination with the Knott's Berry Farm theme park, Knott's Soak City Waterpark and Knott's Hotel. Whether you are looking for a weekend getaway, family road trip, or overnight stay, you’ll find something for everyone!

With the most innovative attraction mix of any trampoline park out there, Big Air truly is the next generation. Jump off the walls on Main Court; test your skills on The Wall™; play above the rim on our SlamDunk lanes; dip, duck, dive and dodge on our Dodgeball court; flip into The Pit; battle your friends on Battlebeam®; or rise to a new challenge on The Laser Maze at Big Air™ — the first trampoline laser maze on the West Coast! And even though we're big, we have plenty of fun for the lil' ones, too -- with our Lil' Air™ Toddler Court and special Toddler Time sessions available weekly!

The Segerstrom Center for the Arts is committed to supporting artistic excellence on all of its stages and offering unsurpassed performances and educational experiences, engaging the entire community in new and exciting ways through the unique power of live performance and an array of inspiring programs. The Center offers a large variety of affordable programs in Dance, Music, Theater, and Visual Arts and welcomes persons of all ages and abilities.

If your family is looking for thrills and excitement, then try indoor go kart racing at K1 Speed in Anaheim! Experience the lightning-fast acceleration of their all-electric go karts. Play video games, air-hockey, and billiards in their arcade! Or recharge at their Paddock Lounge café which serves delicious food and ice-cold drinks for all ages! There's also a private event room for birthday parties and other celebrations! No reservations are needed to enjoy K1 Speed - simply Arrive & Drive! So let your family live out their race car driver dreams and visit K1 Speed today!
